The left-back, who claimed three strikes last season, had to wait until the eighth Premiership outing for his first of the new campaign. The breakthrough effort arrived in the 82nd minute and arrived in [...]

entry.title: HAPPY 25th, ALISTAIR
entry.summary: THIS time last year, Alistair Johnston was playing for CF Montreal in the MLS and looking forward to featuring for Canada in the winter World Cup Finals in Qatar. Today, the adventurous right-back celebrates his 25th birthday as a Celtic player after winning three domestic honours in his first five months at Parkhead. It has [...]

entry.title: HAPPY 700th, BRENDAN
entry.summary: BRENDAN RODGERS celebrated his 700th game as a manager in the 3-1 Premiership triumph over Kilmarnock at Parkhead. The win – his seventh in eight league outings since his June return to the champions – eased the Hoops to seven points clear of St Mirren and 10 ahead of the Ibrox outfit, with both those [...]

entry.title: CONFIRMED: CCV STARTS
entry.summary: CAMERON CARTER-VICKERS will start his first Premiership game in two months when he lines up against Kilmarnock at Parkhead today. The central defender has been missing from the league side since being removed at half-time through injury in the 3-1 win over Aberdeen at Pittodrie on August 13.
